title: You've been disconnected from chat, Attempting to reconnect.
body: For the last month when ever I've tried to log in it logs in normally and I can play games and see my profile but I can't connect to the chat and I can't see anything there not even my own profile picture or my online status. I'm not able to play with any of my friends and I'm forced to play solo, I can't talk to them either which sucks. I've looked at many others discussions that have the same problem and they're fixes but nothing has worked for me and I am starting to give up and quit playing because id rather just keep playing alone and not being able to see the chat. The chat doesn't even look like it's actually attempting to reconnect it just there saying it's trying when it's not -_-.

replies.body: This might be happening if your network can't get a solid connection to our chat servers. Should be easily fixed though, so hit up this little [**port forwarding guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq8) for some steps on how to reconfigure your network.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=YsxKqYH7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-08T01:21:45.608+0000)
>
> This might be happening if your network can't get a solid connection to our chat servers. Should be easily fixed though, so hit up this little [**port forwarding guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq8) for some steps on how to reconfigure your network.

I just got done doing all of that and I'm still getting the same issue I can't see the chat or anything that is supposed to pop up in that little window.
